wo-hen-hao-xing-ren-shi-ni.name: (Wǒ) hěn hǎo xìng rèn shi nǐ.

wo-men-qu-chi-fan-ba.name: Wǒ men qù chí fàn ba!

haole-ma.name: Hǎole ma?
haole-ma.definition: Are you done? Are you ready?

wo-shi-xuesheng-wo-bu-shi-laoshi.definition: I am a student. I am not a teacher.

wo-shi-xuesheng-bu-shi-laoshi.name: Wǒ shi xuéshēng, bú shì lǎoshī.
wo-shi-xuesheng-bu-shi-laoshi.definition: I am a student, not a teacher.

women-dou-meiyou-shu.definition: We all do not have books.

wo-you-liang-bei-cha.name: Wǒ yǒu liǎng bēi chá.
wo-you-liang-bei-cha.definition: I have two cups of tea.

ni-yao-cha-ma-ni-yao-bu-yao-cha.name: Ni yào chá ma? = Ni yào bú yào chá?

women-dou-bu-xihuan-ta.definition: We all do not like him.

tamen-dou-bu-shi-yinni-ren.name: Tāmen dōu bú shì Yìnní rén.

wo-hen-xihuan-chi-baozi.name: Wǒ hěn xǐhuān chī bāozi.
wo-hen-xihuan-chi-baozi.definition: I like to eat bun very much.

wo-bu-xihuan-chi-baozi.name: Wǒ bù xǐhuān chī bāozi.
wo-bu-xihuan-chi-baozi.definition: I do not like to eat bun.

wo-bbu-tai-xihuan-chi-baozi.name: Wǒ bbù tài xǐhuān chī bāozi.
wo-bbu-tai-xihuan-chi-baozi.definition: I do not like to eat bun very much.

ni-taitai-xihuan-h1e-cha-ma.name: Nǐ tàitài xǐhuān h1e chá ma?
ni-taitai-xihuan-h1e-cha-ma.definition: Does your wife like to drink tea?

ni-xiansheng-xihuan-kan-dianying-ma.name: Nǐ xiānshēng xǐhuān kàn diànyǐng ma?
ni-xiansheng-xihuan-kan-dianying-ma.definition: Does your husband like to go to a movie?

ni-gei-wo-nide-hao-ma.name: Nǐ gěi wǒ nǐde hào mā?

yi-bei-naicha-ji-kuai-qian.name: Yì bēi nǎichá jǐ kuài qián?
yi-bei-naicha-ji-kuai-qian.definition: How much is a cup of milk tea?

wo-de-peng-you-de-shou-ji.name: Wǒ de péng yǒu de shǒu jī

ta-zai-chi-mian-bao.name: Tā zài chī miàn bāo.
ta-zai-chi-mian-bao.definition: He is eating a bread right now.

ni-yao-gen-wo-yeshi-ma.name: Nǐ yào (gēn wǒ) yèshì mā?
ni-yao-gen-wo-yeshi-ma.definition: Will you go to night market (with me)?

ta-zai-nali-mai-shui.name: Tā zài nǎlǐ mǎi shuǐ?
ta-zai-nali-mai-shui.definition: Where did she buy the water?

wo-zai-yeshi-mai-yifu.name: Wǒ zài yèshì mǎi yīfú.
wo-zai-yeshi-mai-yifu.definition: I went to a night market to buy clothes.

wo-zuotian-zai-yeshi-mai-yifu.name: Wǒ zuótiān zài yèshì mǎi yīfú.
wo-zuotian-zai-yeshi-mai-yifu.definition: I went to a night market to buy clothes yesterday.

wo-yao-qu-yeshi-mai-yifu.name: Wǒ yào qù yèshì mǎi yīfú.
wo-yao-qu-yeshi-mai-yifu.definition: I want to go to a night market to buy clothes.

wo-mingtian-yao-qu-yeshi-mai-yifu.name: Wǒ míngtiān yào qù yèshì mǎi yīfú.
wo-mingtian-yao-qu-yeshi-mai-yifu.definition: I will go to a night market to buy clothes tomorrow.

women-dou-zai-jiaoshi.name: Wǒmen dōu zài jiàoshi.
women-dou-zai-jiaoshi.definition: We are all in the classroom.

shui-kafei-he-cha-wo-dou-xihuan.name: Shuǐ kāfēi hé chá wǒ dōu xǐhuān.
shui-kafei-he-cha-wo-dou-xihuan.definition: Water, coffee and tea, I like them all.

wo-xihuan-cha-keshi-buxihuan-pijiu.name: Wǒ xǐhuān chá, kěshì bùxǐhuān píjiǔ.
wo-xihuan-cha-keshi-buxihuan-pijiu.definition: I like tea but not beer.

ta-hen-mang-keshi-buei.name: Tā hěn máng, kěshì búèi.
ta-hen-mang-keshi-buei.definition: He is busy but not tired.

ta-hen-ke-keshi-bu-e.name: Tā hěn kě, kěshì bú è.
ta-hen-ke-keshi-bu-e.definition: He is thirsty but not hungry.

ni-xihuan-che-shui-hai-cha.name: Nǐ xǐhuān chē shuǐ hái chá?
ni-xihuan-che-shui-hai-cha.definition: Do you like to dink water or tea?

wo-yao-kafei-huo-shi-cha.name: Wǒ yaò kāfēi huò shì chá.

jintian-tianqi-hen-hao.name: Jīntiān tiānqì hěn hǎo.
jintian-tianqi-hen-hao.definition: The weather is very good today.

nei-liang-che-shi-deguo-che.name: Něi liàng chē shì Déguó chē?
nei-liang-che-shi-deguo-che.definition: Which car is a German car?

ta-mai-le-hen-duo-shuiguo.name: Tā mǎi le hěn duō shuǐguǒ.

ta-jintian-mai-le-hen-duo-shuiguo.name: Tā Jīntiān maǐ le hěn duō shuǐguǒ.

zhei-zhi-shouji-tai-gui.definition: This cell phone is too expensive.

zhei-shuang-taixiao-wo-yao-da-yidian-de.name: Zhèi shuāng tàixiǎo, wǒ yào dà yidiǎn de.
zhei-shuang-taixiao-wo-yao-da-yidian-de.definition: This pair is too small, I want a bigger  one.

nei-jian-tai-duan-chang-yidian.name: Nèi jiàn tài duǎn, chang yìdiǎn.
nei-jian-tai-duan-chang-yidian.definition: That one is too short, longer.

neizhi-bi-hen-haochi.name: Nèizhī bǐ hěn hǎochī.
neizhi-bi-hen-haochi.definition: That pen is good to write.

niuroumian-hen-haochi.name: Niúròumiàn hěn hǎochī.
niuroumian-hen-haochi.definition: Beef noodles are tasty.(good to eat)

neizhong-dongxi-hen-nanchi.name: Něizhǒng dōngxī hěn nánchī?
neizhong-dongxi-hen-nanchi.definition: Which kind of things are disgusting?

yizhi-bi-liangben-shu-yigong-duoshao-qia.name: Yìzhī bǐ, liǎngběn shū, yígòng duōshǎo qián?
yizhi-bi-liangben-shu-yigong-duoshao-qia.definition: A pen, two books, altogether how much are they?
